title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: SEO is an very important part of any website or online application, as with good SEO you can get your targeted visitors and drive more organic traffic to your website.We are pleased to announce our partnership with cPanel for offering our clients cPanel SEO, cPanel SEO is actually a very useful SEO service and set of tools, using which, you can perform different SEO tasks and work on your own projects and websites for better visibility.Now you can purchase the cPanel SEO plans right from Zak Servers website and can manage them from Zak Servers client area, with our partnership with cPanel SEO.To order kindly visit: https://www.zakservers.com/index.php?rp=/store/cpanelseoThanks a lot, as Zak Servers is constantly working to provide much better offshore dedicated hosting solutions for our clients.BTC is accepted as a payment method by Zak Servers.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: zakservers on October 05, 2022, 02:03:26 PMBTC is accepted as a payment method by Zak Servers.I tried to make a test purchase one domain with cPanel SEO Starter using Bitcoin, but I needed to enter all my personal information and I didn't want to do that.Is there a way I could make a purchase in anonymous way without entering all this stuff, and can you tell me how exactly you accept Bitcoin payments, using third party service or something else?

comments.author: zakservers
comments.created_time: October 05, 2022, 03:23:49 PMLast edit: October 05, 2022, 03:45:57 PM by zakservers
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on October 05, 2022, 02:50:34 PMQuote from: zakservers on October 05, 2022, 02:03:26 PMBTC is accepted as a payment method by Zak Servers.I tried to make a test purchase one domain with cPanel SEO Starter using Bitcoin, but I needed to enter all my personal information and I didn't want to do that.Is there a way I could make a purchase in anonymous way without entering all this stuff, and can you tell me how exactly you accept Bitcoin payments, using third party service or something else?  Hi, Actually you can also order using anonymous information, kindly only keep your email address right, so that we can communicate with you.We do accept BTC payments via blockonomics, and never had any issue, as you will get redirected to the payment page with BTC wallet address to send the invoice amount to, and once paid, your invoice will be marked as paid automatically and transaction will be applied to your account, all automatically. We never had any client issues with it.You can also use our live chat for any issues or guidance, and our support staff works 24/7/365 which you can reach from client area, support ticket system, with a guaranteed 15 minutes response time.Please note that as an offshore dedicated servers provider, we keep our clients confidentiality and privacy very high, and you can also signup with us using proton email for further privacy, as our many clients do same.Thanks.
